tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE geofence_breaches (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE geofence_logs (
  log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  breach_id UUID REFERENCES geofence_breaches(id),
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE user_roles (
  user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  role VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE geofence_breaches (
	breach_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	location VARCHAR(255),
	breach_time TIMESTAMP,
	breach_reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE users (
	user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	username VARCHAR(50),
	email VARCHAR(100),
	role VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE geofences (
	geofence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	geofence_name VARCHAR(50),
	geofence_type VARCHAR(20),
	zone_coordinates VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE user_geofence_access (
	access_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	user_id INT,
	geofence_id INT,
	access_level VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE geofence_breaches (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  role VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE geofences (
  geofence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  geofence_name VARCHAR(100),
  boundary_polygon POLYGON
)

CREATE TABLE security_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_type VARCHAR(50),
  detail TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_logs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  action VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
